io.hekate.metrics.local

Interface MetricsSnapshot

  • All Superinterfaces:
    MetricsSource
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    MetricsUpdateEvent

    public interface MetricsSnapshot
extends MetricsSource
    A point in time snapshot of aggregated metrics.

    Such snapshots are calculated once per LocalMetricsServiceFactory.setRefreshInterval(long) and can be accessed via LocalMetricsService.snapshot().

    See Also:
    LocalMetricsService

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int tick()
      Returns the sequence number of this snapshot (starting with 0).
